situation: B panicked when art class was moved to a different room, causing him to get anxious and refuse to draw.
action: B was told to 'just go with the flow' and was left to sit alone at a different table. The teacher did not offer further assistance or explanation.
effect: B felt isolated and did not complete his work, missing out on the art activity entirely. His feelings of confusion persisted, impacting his mood for the rest of the day.
topic: Routine Disruptions - Changes in daily schedule or expected activities
